DOC.brief_summary: CAR is short for cortisol awakening response. The neural mechanism of CAR effect on high-order cognition and social cognition is less known...
DOC.brief_title: Neural Mechanism of Cortisol Awakening Response Suppression Effect on Human High-order and Social Cognitions
DOC.criteria: Healthy college students. Current or history of psychiatric or neurological illness. Current use of any medications.
